author: jbellis
msg: add system tests.  each method in test/system/test_server.py exercises part of the thrift API, and manages cleaning out data files and starting a fresh server for each test.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Eric Evans for CASSANDRA-102
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-4185 Make timeout settable or increase default for one replication message layer protocol.
Increase timeout for accepting reply from slave when initializing
replication or stopping replication/failing over from 5 to 30 seconds
for actions to work more reliably under load. We chose not to make
this a user knob for now.
